text: Kajekaje'i amara tamra kache pratyadesa pathalama e'i bale -- ''amadera cokhera samane ebam amadera pratyadesa motabeka jahajati tairi kara, tarapara amadera nirdesa yakhana asabe o pani uthale uthabe takhana tate uthiye na'o hareka rakamera joraya- joraya, duti kaâ€™re, ara tomara paribara parijanake, -- tadera madhyera yara birud'dhe baktabya ghosita hayeche take byatita ara yara an'yayacarana kareche tadera sanbandhe tumi amara kache balabali karo na. Tara to nimajjita habe'i.
